name: Fisherman (itch)
description:
Story: You are a fisherman who seeks to catch the most fish one possibly can, while racing against the clock. Do you dare to not just fish in the shallow but also deep waters?

Game play: Control the boat with "A", "D" keys and control your hook with the directional keys on your keyboard. You have 3 minutes to catch as much fish as you can. Remember, your hook can only catch one fish at a time. After every successful catch you need to reel the fish back to your boat.

For whom: This project embodies the simpler times of Atari and online Flash games. Enjoy it for few minutes, while trying to beat your high score.

Credits & Assets: Visuals - drawn. Sounds - freesound.org
